sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都表示"建筑物"之意。
means: building ： 普通用词，指任何建筑物，但不涉及建筑物的大小、风格以及所用材料。
structure ： 侧重建筑物的构造形式。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"居住处"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: house, building, dwelling, shelter, habitation, home, residence
means: house ： 中性词，泛指一切供居住的建筑物，尤指适合一家一户居住的房屋。
building ： 泛指一切建筑物，不限于居住的房子。
dwelling ： 正式用词，仅指人们居住的任何建筑物。
shelter ： 可指长期或临时的住处，也指简陋或临时搭建的躲避风雨的场所。
habitation ： 指长久或固定的住所或居住地。
home ： 指永久住家时，带有家庭所特有的温暖、情感等气息。
residence ： 指大而堂皇的寓所或公馆，也指法律上的居住点。

sentence.Network_en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

sentence.Network_en: The building he was lodged in turned out to be a church.
sentence.Network_cn: 原来，他租住的那栋建筑是一座教堂。

sentence.Network_en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

encyclopedia.content: 网络解释 (building)网络解释 (building) 建筑物 可以用来模拟建筑物开窗锛埢蚨纯诘蕊級对建筑物室内通风的影响，通风模式，房间之间的通风状况，计算通风量，以及由此带来的对于能量消耗，以及人体热舒适度等的影响。 http://www.abbs.com.cn/bbs/post/view?bid=1&id=1205304&... - 搜索相关网页 建筑 人们相信建筑设计也可以有其科学的方法，说得极端一点儿，就象科学实验一样，只要按照同一个过程去做，得出的结果就八

entry.def: A building is a structure that has a roof and walls, for example a house or a factory.

example.ex: They were on the upper floor of the building...
example.tran: 他们在这座建筑物的楼上。

example.ex: Crowds gathered around the Parliament building.
example.tran: 人群聚集在议会大厦的周围。

means.word_mean: 1. a structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place;

sentences.sentence: "there was a three-story building on the corner"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of constructing or building something;

sentences.sentence: "during the construction we had to take a detour"
"his hobby was the building of boats"

means.word_mean: 3. the commercial activity involved in constructing buildings;

sentences.sentence: "the entire building complained about the noise"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的

exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的

hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的

inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的

out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的

threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city

The city is the building block of civilisation and of almost everything people do; a guidebook to the city is really, therefore, a guidebook to how a large and ever-growing chunk of humanity chooses to live.

jushi.english: He blew his top when he was accused of having set fire to that building.
jushi.chinese: 当有人指控他纵火烧了那所楼房时,他的肺都气炸了。

jushi.english: The truck brought up suddenly against a building.
jushi.chinese: 卡车突然在一栋房子前面停了下来。

jushi.english: The boom of aircraft can be heard inside the building.
jushi.chinese: 飞机的隆隆声在这座楼里也能听见。
